```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)

mlb <- read_csv("mlb_elo.csv") %>% 
  filter(season>1994)%>%
  #arrange(season, date)%>%
  #group_by(season, team)%>%
  #mutate(game_number = row_number()) %>% 
  mutate(playoff = case_when(game_number > 162 ~ 1,
                             TRUE ~ 0))

mlb

write_csv(mlb, "mlb_elo.csv")
```
